name: Healer's Cottage
description: A small thatched cottage at the edge of the village, surrounded by herb gardens.
detailedDescription: The sweet and pungent smells of various medicinal plants waft from the neatly tended garden beds. Smoke curls from the chimney, carrying hints of brewing remedies.

name: Village Square
description: The central gathering place of the village, bustling with activity.
detailedDescription: Cobblestones worn smooth from generations of villagers' feet create a pleasant open space where merchants, travelers, and locals cross paths throughout the day.

name: Blacksmith Forge
description: A sturdy stone building with smoke billowing from its chimney.
detailedDescription: The rhythmic clanging of metal on metal can be heard well before you reach this essential village business. Heat radiates from the open doorway.

name: Crown and Flagon Tavern
description: The village's bustling tavern, center of social life and gossip.
detailedDescription: Warmth and laughter spill from the doorway along with the aroma of hearty stew and ale. The tavern serves as both inn and meeting place for locals and travelers alike.

name: Village Guard Post
description: A stone building near the village entrance where the local guards operate.
detailedDescription: The small but sturdy building houses the village's protective force. A bulletin board outside displays notices and warnings for travelers.

name: Market Grounds
description: An open area where merchants set up stalls on market days.
detailedDescription: Though quiet on regular days, this space transforms during market days into a vibrant hub of commerce, filled with traders from throughout the region.

name: Forest Trail
description: A winding path through ancient trees at the edge of the village.
detailedDescription: Sunlight filters through the dense canopy, creating dappled patterns on the forest floor. The sounds of the village fade as the wilderness embraces you.

name: Hunter's Camp
description: A small, semi-permanent camp deep in the forest.
detailedDescription: Hidden among the trees, this camp serves as a base for the village hunters and trappers who provide game for the local tables.

name: Hillside Monastery
description: An ancient stone monastery perched on a gentle hill overlooking the village.
detailedDescription: The weathered stone walls have stood for centuries, housing monks devoted to prayer, study, and healing.

name: Monastery Gardens
description: Peaceful gardens surrounding the monastery where herbs and vegetables are grown.
detailedDescription: Meticulously tended beds of herbs, vegetables, and flowers create a serene space where monks tend to earthly needs while contemplating higher matters.
